p: The University of Texas Medical Branch (UTMB) had several available VEEV IC human isolates with a single passage in Vero cells, from which the INH-9813 and INH-6803 strains from the 1995 outbreak in Colombia and Venezuela were selected for further evaluation ( Table 2). UTMB also had a VEEV IC SH3 strain (human isolate with a single passage in Vero cells) from a less extensive Venezuelan outbreak in 1993. Other VEEV IC strains listed in Table 2 were not considered as they were not human isolates, or because they had less favorable passage histories than the INH-9813 and INH-6803 human isolates [ 54].
